p: Broccoliâ€™s EO was constituted of isothiocyanates for over 97% of its total, with 4-pentenyl, phenethyl, and 3-butenyl isothiocyanates collectively representing over 95% of the total composition. Among the non-isothiocyanates compounds, only 5-cyano-1-pentene exhibited a relative abundance over 1.0%.
